objects.text:
• Rose gold plated finish
• Sparkling cubic zirconia crystals
• Two-piece versatile design
• Perfect for romantic occasions

product_details.name: Enchanting Rose Gold Four-Heart Clover & Heart Chain Necklace Set
product_details.description:
• Premium rose gold plated finish for elegant sophistication
• Two-piece necklace set featuring a four-heart clover pendant and connected hearts design
• Adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia crystals for maximum brilliance
• Delicate link chain with secure clasp closure
• Perfect layering pieces that can be worn together or separately
• Ideal for romantic occasions, gifts, or everyday luxury
• Intricate filigree heart details showcasing expert craftsmanship
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive skin
• Comes in a beautiful gift-ready presentation box
• Versatile design that complements both casual and formal attire

banner_details:
This banner showcases an elegant promotional design for a jewelry product, primarily the "Heart & Clover" necklace set. The layout includes a large, bold heading (`heading`) and a complementary subheading (`subheading`), both top-aligned. Below them is a subtle horizontal divider (`decorative`) that separates the section from the descriptive text block (`description`), which enumerates four key product features using bullet points. The stylish, italicized tagline (`tagline`) adds a romantic touch above the prominently featured price (`price`). A clear and bold call-to-action button, made of a background rectangle (`cta_background`) with overlaid text (`cta`), anchors the bottom-left corner. On the right side, a detailed product image (`product_image`) balances the composition, embedded over a geometric, pastel-toned gradient background (`background`).

**Color Palette**:
- Rosewood: `#8B3A4A`
- Mauve Berry: `#9E4257`
- Light Blush: `#F9E4E8`
- Dusty Pink: `#E8B8C2`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Pink: `#D1919F`
product_color: The product image features a delicate rose gold necklace set with heart-shaped motifs that form a four-leaf clover when joined. The dominant color is a soft, elegant **rose gold (#B76E79)** that gives the design a luxurious and romantic feel. Accents of **crystal white (#F8F8F8)** and subtle **metallic silver (#C0C0C0)** detail the inner patterns, highlighting the fine craftsmanship. The rose gold merges seamlessly with the sparkling crystals, creating a balanced and sophisticated look. Ideal color palette for an advertisement banner includes rose gold, muted blush pink (#F4C2C2), crystal white, and a soft charcoal gray (#4A4A4A) for elegant contrast and readability.
